subject: Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: The most successful active coach in the Bowl Subdivision, Frank Beamer, whose first game is against Alabama, has a career record of 258-127-4.
snippet: The most successful active coach in the Bowl Subdivision, Frank Beamer, whose first game is against Alabama, has a career record of 258-127-4.
